resources.string: You have successfully completed the first step of the test.\n\nYou can now start the second step whenever you are ready for it.
Your time for the aptitude test has finished.\n\nYou can now start the second step whenever you are ready for it.
Are you sure you want to finish your test?
Are you sure you want to finish your test?
How confident are you about your answer?

All the questions in the test are optional. If you want to skip any question, you can do so.

Each question requires you to provide the answer as well as confidence you have regarding your answer. Your confidence will effect how much effect the question will have on you final score. The more confident you are for a correct answer, the more score you will get. Similarly, the more confident you are for a wrong answer, the more negative score you will get. So, answer each question carefully.

You can mark a question so that you can later visit it before submitting the test. To switch questions, you can use the dropdown menu which displays the current question number.

The color of the questions denotes their state, red is unaswerd, yellow is marked and green is answered.

If you do not submit your test before the time limit, it will get auto sumitted as soon as the timer reaches zero.

All the best!
